mapper.select: select (select sum(natDefCnt) as natDefCnt from corona_world where date_sub(date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d"), interval -1 day) = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")) - (select sum(natDefCnt) as natDefCnt from corona_world where date_sub(date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d"), interval -2 day) = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d"))as diff from corona_world cw limit 1

select (select sum(natDefCnt) as natDefCnt from corona_world where date_sub(date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d"), interval -7 day) = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")) - (select sum(natDefCnt) as natDefCnt from corona_world where date_sub(date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d"), interval -8 day) = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d"))as diff from corona_world cw limit 1

select date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d")as chartDate, sum(natDefCnt) as atDefCnt ,sum(natDeathCnt) as natDeathCnt from corona_world
where date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d") between date_sub(date_format(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d"),interval 1 month) and date_format(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")
where date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d") between date_sub(date_format(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d"),interval 1 month) and date_format(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")
group by date_format(createDt,"%Y-%m-%d");
